<image>
<image>
<image>
I am going to start cycling  and want to record the time for completing 1 Mile and do the improvement accordingly , Start the stopwatch in the clock app .

Click on button with the text "Stopwatch"
Click on button with the function of "Start"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
Set a timer for 30 minutes in the clock app

Click on button with the text "Timer"
Click on button with the text "3"
Click on button with the text "0"
Click on button with the text "00"
Click on button with the function of "Start"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
the timer, which was created by me I want to pause it.

Open App: The Clock
Click on button with the text "Timer"
Wait for response
Click on point (968,709)
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
In the ClockBuddy app Pause the current 14 timer.

Open App: ClockBuddy
Click on point (994,300)
Click on point (966,671)
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
I have to reach the office at 9:00 AM after finishing all the household chores, so I will need to wake up early in the morning, so set an alarm for me at 7:00 AM on the Clock app.

Open App: Clock
Click on button with the text "Alarm"
Click on button with the function of "Add alarm"
Click on button with the text "7"
Click on button with the text "AM"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
there is some changes with the flight timings till further updates , Pause the timer in the clock app

Open App: Clock
Click on button with the function of "Pause"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
I want a nap of 10 min , snooze the 09:25 Alarm for the same in the clock app

Click on button with the text "Alarm"
Click on button with the function of "Add alarm"
Click on button with the text "9"
Click on button with the text "25"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Click on button with the text "Add label"
Type text: nap
Click on button with the text "OK"
Wait for response
Click on button with the function of "9:25 AM nap"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
Set an alarm for 6 p.m. in my clock app with the label "Gym" since I need to go to the gym to work out.

Open App: Clock
Click on button with the function of "Add alarm"
Click on button with the text "6"
Click on button with the text "PM"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Click on button with the text "Add label"
Type text: Gym
Click on button with the text "OK"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
Open the Clock app and delete the 9:25 AM alarm.

Open App: Clock
Click on button with the function of "Expand 9:25 AM alarm"
Click on button with the text "Delete"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
Pause the yoga timer after 30 seconds in the Alarm Clock Extreme app.

Click on button with the text "START TIMER"
Click on button with the function of "Pause icon"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
The current timer in the clock app should be stopped because it is no longer required.

Click on button with the function of "Pause"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
I haven't done my job yet, and the work alarm has begun to ring, so snooze the 9:20 PM alarm in the Clock app.

Click on point (283,434)
Check status: successful

I want to set an alarm at 6:00 PM for every weekday on the clock app for cycling so that I don't miss my workout.

Open App: Clock
Click on button with the function of "Add alarm"
Click on button with the text "6"
Click on button with the text "PM"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Click on button with the text "M"
Click on button with the text "T"
Click on button with the text "W"
Click on button with the text "T"
Click on button with the text "F"
Check status: successful

<image>
I am baking a cake for my grandson because he is visiting me today. In the Clock app, set a timer for 40 minutes.

Click on button with the text "Timer"
Click on button with the function of "Add timer"
Click on button with the text "4"
Click on button with the text "0"
Click on button with the text "4"
Click on button with the text "0"
Click on button with the function of "Start"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
I shall be travelling to London , Next week and wanted to view the time zone for London , Add the London UK time zone in the clock app.

Open App: Clock
Click on button with the function of "Add city"
Type text: London
Click on button with the text "London, UK"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>

Click on button with the text "+1:00"
Click on button with the text "+1:00"

Scroll down

Click on button with the function of "7:00 PM Dinner"

Click on button with the text "6"

Click on button with the text "OK"
